website_summaries.verdict: The Epson VS240 offers solid data-image quality in an SVGA data projector at a bargain price.
pros: Long bulb life and low cost for replacement bulbs

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture Quality, Surprisingly good sound
customer_reviews.text: I originally intended to purchase this projector strictly for business meeting presentations. And it's perfect for projecting PowerPoint Presentations onto a whiteboard. The projector is extremely bright, so your audience shouldn't have any issues viewing it in a brightly lit room. I couldn't resist testing it out by using it for Youtube, movies, etc., and that's where this projector amazed me. I projected a movie onto a blank wall in my home and was blown away by the video quality and clarity of it. The speakers can also get surprisingly loud. Minor complaints include a semi-loud fan, and it gets extremely hot after a few minutes of use. Would recommend for home theater or office presentation use!
customer_reviews.author: Larger

customer_reviews.title: Great projector!
customer_reviews.text: This projector works wonderfully and the display was very good in light and dark settings. I scoured the internet and Amazon reading view after review for the projector that would work best for me on movie nights and during presentations and I am absolutely pleased with this Epson model. I connected external speakers for greater sound and it worked even better. The set up is very easy and offers great quality visuals.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Kay

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great picture, nice size. As a novice in projectors, this is easy and very nice
customer_reviews.text: Got the projector out of the box, plugged it in to the wall, turned it on and hooked it up to my computer. Within a ten minutes of receiving it I had YouTube 15 ft wide on my wall. Watched the Warriors/Spurs game on it with an HD Stream last night. It was beautiful. Highly recommend this product based only on the first few days of owning it.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Hot!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the master bedroom with a 100 inch screen to watch movies in bed. I am beyond impressed with how it turned out. Picture looks great and even though I also purchased Bluetooth speakers to go with it, the speaker on this unit is actually pretty good. Only downside is that it does put out quite a bit of heat when running and needs to be in a well ventilated space; I could see it heating up a small room very quick!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew T. Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is amazing but the internal speakers are garbage
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is amazing but the internal speakers are garbage. There are no audio outputs on this projector. I will repeat that there are no audio outputs on this projector. You can hook up external speakers through hdmi splitter so it's not a total loss.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: ... this projector for presentations and so far I am happy with it in my presentations
customer_reviews.text: I want to use this projector for presentations and so far I am happy with it in my presentations. The one disappointment I had is that I cannot use a Powerpoint presentation on a memory stick with it, even though it has a slot for a memory stick. It does not have the functionality to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Ogden

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product; especially for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe the price for such an excellent product. Based on our experience to date we would highly recommend this product. We are a small start-up company, but needed this to make some marketing presentations to prospective clients. It's perfect for our needs. Seems like a very good quality product. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for backyard movies and football games.
customer_reviews.text: An excellent value! It clearly projects a vivid 15 foot (diagonal) screen (maybe even bigger if you have the screen). It was great for backyard movie night. We will be using it for football games as well. There are a few options I wish I had opted for: Stereo output and 16:9 projection This would have cost a lot more and I didn't anticipate how much I would enjoy it. The adjustable feet (for projection height adjustment) feel cheap. Although they have not failed in any way. This is an effective/affordable projector, that should wow the user.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Zirger

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, very bright
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to do movies in our backyard. Great picture, very bright. We've started the movie slightly before dusk and it still shows great. We had a little trouble connecting another sound system to it but finally figured out a way. The speaker on it has worked for small groups if you sit close to the projector but definitely want something bigger for larger groups.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie L Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We love this projector. The picture is so clear even during the daytime. It's very easy to set up. My kids love having movie night in the living room. We project it straight onto the wall. We can't wait to start having outside movie night when it warms up some.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good. Easy to use. BUT could be better
customer_reviews.text: I bought because other buyers said it was easy to set up. I agree it was easy to set up. I was showing a power point presentation inside of 30 minutes. Like other users I was (am) disappointed that I have not yet got it to project off a memory stick. I call the help number and it was NOT a help. I wish I could turn the volume up when I use it to project a You Tube video.
customer_reviews.author: tjmm5

customer_reviews.title: Good projector but lacks audio output connections
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this for over a year for indoor viewing, and outdoor movies and sports. We plug in a Fire TV or Roku stick into the HDMI port and it works great. My only complaint is it lacks audio output connections. Of course, there are a few workarounds (splitter, Bluetooth through the fire TV, Roku app), but it's hassle so we often just rely on the terrible speaker, which also has only five discrete volume levels.
customer_reviews.author: H L

customer_reviews.title: Great projector, and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great projector, and easy to use. It is just the sound problem (it doesn't connect to any external audio device!!)
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and use
customer_reviews.text: Got this to have an outdoor movie party for Halloween. Easy to setup and use. Used a portable DVD player to input video. Used a Bose Bluetooth speaker for sound (it has an input for sound on the back, connected it to the portable DVD player). Would love for the projector itself to have an output for sound. That would make setup easier, but it's still easy to use and fun to have around.
customer_reviews.author: CUofSC

customer_reviews.title: Worth every dollar.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a $100 projector previous to this one and returned it immediately since it was a piece of junk. This was a breath of fresh air (light) when it showed up and is living up to my expectations for a reputable brand like Epson. A bit more than I wanted to pay since my use of this will be occasional at best but I am so happy I spent the extra money to get a product that performs above my initial expectations / needs. Highly recommended. Zero complaints at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Sprague

customer_reviews.title: Decent but....
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped to replace a large monitor with this projector, but the image is no where as sharp. I have had to do a lot of projector repositioning to get a half-way decent image for presentations, with the end result being less than stellar. Overall ok, bit not what I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Christophe

customer_reviews.title: Bright Beamer
customer_reviews.text: Very nice projector. Use it for meetings in lit offices and its bright enough for everyone to see. Small enough and packed with features.
customer_reviews.author: Ron J. VanBenschoten

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This did the trick! Ordered this for work orientation presentations. We played it against a white brick wall, and it was fine! There was some light coming in from the other room (we couldn't help it) and it was very bright and clear anyway. Two thumbs up! Was also very easy to use and figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: great alternative to a tv
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a year ago to be a regular television in our home. It is hooked up to either a cable for direct TV, or an I pad for the apps like Hulu, Amazon Prime, Netflix, and HBO Go, and a DVD player. I had a difficult time finding a sound system for it but instead just use the sound on the projector. it isn't great sound for a movie theater setting but it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: in a dark room it's like a movie projector
customer_reviews.text: Have used this several times for presentations. Sets up quickly and provides bright illumination even in a lit room; in a dark room it's like a movie projector. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: psalmscat

customer_reviews.title: Works well and easy to handle.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and easy to handle. It has a language list to choose from. I use it to watch football game and feels quite better than on a big size monitor. It needs small room to store.
customer_reviews.author: Meng

customer_reviews.title: but fantastic other than that
customer_reviews.text: Gets very hot, which makes me nervous, but fantastic other than that!! Still trying to find a good place for it, but that is a personal problem, lol...So cost efficient! And huge space saver!! Way better than buying a huge TV for thousandsof $$!
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca

customer_reviews.title: outdoor Projector
customer_reviews.text: Item was delivered to an address in Texas instead of mine. I contacted the company and they immediately sent out another item but it arrived a week later than originally stated. Once we received the projector we were very satisfied with the brightness outdoor and the size of the screen projection. We project on the side of an RV garage and it fills the entire length and width. The speakers are ok if there are only a couple of people watching but you will need to add external speakers if you have a large group.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is great. The sound is fine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to show movies on our patio. I connect our Blu Ray player or a laptop to it and can stream movies or watch a disc. Picture quality is great. The sound is fine, if we are using it with a small group on our patio. However, I needed speakers when we used it for our neighborhood movie night. It is not Bluetooth and most speakers these days are Bluetooth so you will have to hook up your speakers to your Blu Ray or laptop rather than the projector. We have had so much fun inviting friends over this summer and having our own outdoor movie theater.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Lasted two hours and died. The company will not help with a replacement. Poor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: DRO

customer_reviews.title: Must Have for a Gadget Lover Like Me.
customer_reviews.text: So far, I am liking it. I am learning how to adjust it. I purchased it to use at my 50th high school class reunion; it's wonderful to have this projector here in my home as updates are made to several videos that are sure to be "hits." It's working as advertised so no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita S. Womack

customer_reviews.title: Sound is good for running Video clips
customer_reviews.text: Connected it to my computer to run power points presentations at customers locations. Connected right away no issues. Sound is good for running Video clips.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Schuerman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality images
customer_reviews.text: Great quality images, easy to use, easy to set up. Bought the HDMI cables for ease of use. I would recommend this as a mid-range unit.
customer_reviews.author: ckc59

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous...save for a major flaw
customer_reviews.text: This projector is fabulous. The picture is awesome. It's still okay in a fully lit room (though much better when dim or dark). It runs a little on the hot side, but it's not too loud. The price for the quality is really amazing. I use this as my primary TV. The only reason it doesn't get 5 stars is because when using HDMI input there's no way to use external speakers. While the internal speaker isn't the worst in the world, I'm very disappointed that I can't use my "real" speakers. Major design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Jai Bhagti Kaur

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is excellent. Able to use for business presentation in a room with lights on and still able to see the projection well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color shows up great even on a dark painted wall
customer_reviews.text: Purchased three times now. Never had a problem with them. Color shows up great even on a dark painted wall. I do supplement better speakers, though.
customer_reviews.author: KarmaCollar

customer_reviews.title: good projector
customer_reviews.text: if you are looking for a reasonably priced projector for your home or a small office for presentations this is the one
customer_reviews.author: Walt Temple

customer_reviews.title: I am 100% pleased. It has a very good picture without having ...
customer_reviews.text: Not knowing which one of these to get, i did some research and ended up on this one. I use it of outside movies for my kids and ballgames with my neighbors. I am 100% pleased. It has a very good picture without having to be pitch black outside. Very easy to set, I started a movie on my laptop and plug this in and that was all. I connect a Bluetooth speaker to my laptop and that's all you need.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Porter

customer_reviews.title: Best for It's Price
customer_reviews.text: Best for It's Price. Higly Recommend. NEW PROJECTOR BUYERS this how it works. the more LUMENS the better it is in the Light, and more likely clarity. The Lumens are Poor ON those cheaper models. 1200-1500 is not Great, only Good for dark and even with that is not as extremely sharp. I originally bought the $100 cheaper projectors, until someone told me about Epson. It Is a GREAT Difference In Clarity. Don't be so Overrated with those 3d/hd cheaper projectors you will not get Sharp nor Crisp Quality Like You get from epson. Work Fine WithLight ON, but can improve.
customer_reviews.author: Lover Boy

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for office - works for presentations. You do ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for office - works for presentations. You do not need to order an extra VGA Plug it comes with the unit. We did not know this or spend money on plugs we did not need.
customer_reviews.author: Juli Vieira

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice projector
customer_reviews.text: Very nice projector. I purchased it for meetings in Church and at Work. The picture is very clear. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase, great quality projector
customer_reviews.text: Clear on our huge living room wall, even during the day!
customer_reviews.author: KemR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Works for my power point presentations
customer_reviews.author: Susan D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Works great... easy to use. I use for small business presentations and it's just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: rdrgrl

customer_reviews.title: This is a great projector for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great projector for the price. It's slim, not too loud, very bright, easy to use, and compatible with every device. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed, but bulb blew within a year of limited use
customer_reviews.author: Peter Bluemmel

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to use and the clarity and brightness was excellent
customer_reviews.text: I'm unable to go into too much detail about the projector as I only used it for a reverse window Santa display. It ran nearly every night for 4 to 6 hours and I had zero issues with it. It was very easy to use and the clarity and brightness was excellent. Overall, I was very happy with its performance.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great product did not work well during the day but ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product did not work well during the day but excellent at night very clear and a wonderful price plus they ship to Alaska but can't beat that 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great projector! we looked for some time one to ...
customer_reviews.text: great projector! we looked for some time one to use for our church worship powerpoint presentations. was worth the cost to get a good one.
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for showing videos and PPTs in my classroom of about 30 students.
customer_reviews.author: James02

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for creating at-home theater experience without paying for big-screen TV
customer_reviews.text: This has replaced our large-screen TV. We just hook it up to our audio system and stream Netflix or whatever over the internet, and we have our own in-home movie theater projected onto a screen or wall. Best investment ever!
customer_reviews.author: IS

customer_reviews.title: Cool Down option is a time Saver
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived within a few days I have used it twice with no problems. Start Up is easy and the cool down cycle is much easier than previous models. The price was right. The packaging was sturdy and I still use it to carry the projector from location to location.
customer_reviews.author: Dinah Arnette Lechner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: really clear images, using it in church, remote works well from long distance. no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Tim N.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and good picture
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the money. Whish it had 2 HDMI ports but a great starter unit.
customer_reviews.author: dlapeteeters

customer_reviews.title: This projector is fantastic! Bright clear
customer_reviews.text: This projector is fantastic! Bright clear, sharp picture with HDMI input for computer connection. It is very hard to beat this projector for the price and I researched many others and they just didn't stack up, compared to the Epson's feature set. Did an important professional presentation with it and even in a non-darkened warehouse size room, the picture was great. Highly recommended...
customer_reviews.author: H. Wolfe III

customer_reviews.title: Great device for the classroom
customer_reviews.text: Great device for the classroom I use to teach painting in class. It's a very effective tool for teaching
customer_reviews.author: Donna Artsy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Only slight negative is no 1/8 in audio out jack.
customer_reviews.author: D. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the price it performed as expected. If I need another one , I buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ripley

customer_reviews.title: Viewing quality is crisp and clear!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Very bright and can view what is projected very well, even in a room that is not fully dark. I use this for work and I was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: rly

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive for the price!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I'm very impressed! I've only tried it once but it was so easy to set up (didn't even read the instructions) and the picture looks amazing. I bought an HDMI cable and adapter to play from a MacBook. I also used my own good speakers plugged into the laptop instead of the projector speakers. For $300, the quality is awesome. Can't wait to try it outside for summer movie nights and football games by the firepit. (The attached pic is projected on my kids' bedroom wall.)
customer_reviews.author: Laura G.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for Price
customer_reviews.text: Works well, easy to figure out, and projects well. Should have included the HDMI so don't have to make a separate trip.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Still using it daily for our family tv and it works great! We’ve had it for a year now and haven’t noticed any color dimming or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector. The Lumens alone make this a great ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Projector. The Lumens alone make this a great unit. Bright enough to show projected data without turning down the lights. Only wish it had a 1/8" phone plug so the HDMI hook up could be overridden so it can be plugged into a PA system for sound. But with the SVGA port, sound can come from an external source. Overall, Value for the price is very good with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang For Your $$$$
customer_reviews.text: I've Had Several Projectors In The Past 20 Yrs... & I Must Say... This Is Not My Best... But For The Price & Quality Of This Projector Is Outstanding!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nate Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Nicest projector
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift I gave someone and she was excited and very happy to see the way it worked, in light or dark the projection is amazing and doesn't go blurred as others; definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.author: ECustomer

customer_reviews.title: Works very well for our ghetto home theater. We ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for our ghetto home theater. We put it out only when we want to watch and project onto an old-school tripod screen, circa 1950s.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Brunette

customer_reviews.title: We have really enjoyed this projector
customer_reviews.text: We have really enjoyed this projector. Watching movies at night has been wonderful. P effect picture. Recommend speakers to hook up. Easy hook up on all kinds of devices.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item to use it in our warehouse. It is placed in a very well lit place and the performance is amazing. Quiet operation.
customer_reviews.author: Mazahar

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Wields great. Very clear. Speaker isn't great, but they never are.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Z

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This projector has great clarity up to at least 100". The only issue I have with it, is it only has 1 HDMI port. Other than that a great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Vida Drake

customer_reviews.title: Works really well - it's hard to find the perfect angle but I'm not sure if that's my uneven ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well - it's hard to find the perfect angle but I'm not sure if that's my uneven floor or the projector. GET A CASE FOR IT - it's super sensitive
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, planning to order again for our new office
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great color and brightness. even with the lights on it still puts on a great show!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the price it is a very good machine!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing machine for such a low price. We are using a large wall to project our movies and the color and clarity are great!
customer_reviews.author: RockHunter

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: This product is outstanding and worth the purchase, we use it outside to watch movies and can start using it before the sun has set as it is fairly bright and it projects a good distance.
customer_reviews.author: Luc

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice bright picture bought it for church they liked it
customer_reviews.author: Jose Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: It works well and still going. Good brightness and picture quality.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pic I'm fully lit room or dark room. Great price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shanita

customer_reviews.title: quiet and good picture!
customer_reviews.text: Use this in my movie room, quiet and good picture!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany B.

customer_reviews.title: Very clear and bright picture. Can watch in the daytime with no issues
customer_reviews.text: Great projector for great price! Only downfall is there is no aux hookup or Audio output surround sound.
customer_reviews.author: Chris martinez

customer_reviews.title: Bright Clear Projection
customer_reviews.text: Terrific. Nice and bright and extremely clear! Wish I would have considered the 16;9 aspect ratio. I worry that the standard def ratio is a bit limiting.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: But he's happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a friend so I cant give a review. But he's happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Goukid7

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this it has a great picture
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this it has a great picture. My family has already enjoyed this so much in just the past few weeks we have had it
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit!
customer_reviews.text: The projector works great. Very easy to get working picture is great and the unit puts out sound which is cool as well. We love it thank you!
customer_reviews.author: K_Wol89_WRG

customer_reviews.title: Bright image, Easy Setup
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup. Very bright image. Compact size makes it easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Bud Veazey

customer_reviews.title: Kids love watching movies outside
customer_reviews.text: Kids love watching movies outside...I was technologically challenged so finding proper cables for connecting devices was difficult, but no reflection on the quality of this product...just an FYI for future purchasers.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Devolgado

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best deal you can find for a golf simulator where you need a short throw projector.
customer_reviews.author: jd jr

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, quiet and bright display. Worth the money. Nothing to extravagant but very solid projector and easy to transport. Wish it had a carrying case/bag.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Fyfe

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased this projector for our small non-profit and we love it! Came quickly and works exactly as described.

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: The unit functioned for 1 hour, then stopped working. Also I paid $30.05 for returning the unit and was only credited for around $12.00. Bad experience with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice projector. I use it for workshops. good picture that shows up well in a lit room.
customer_reviews.author: Soxfan59

customer_reviews.title: Great projector at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Really good projector, and fantastic price. I'm really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: B Dizzle Fizzle

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping! Great product!!! Good quality! Compact and lightweight design makes the projector easy to transport. Amazing price!
customer_reviews.author: Dara D'Elia

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful and inexpensive projector
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful and inexpensive projector. It is very bright.I have used it for presentations in large rooms with no problems. It is easy to operate as well. So far I am very please with this machine!
customer_reviews.author: K Klenk

customer_reviews.title: Superseded my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this Epson projector. The quality superseded my expectations. The sound and picture is fantastic. The fan noise is normal, nothing to complain about. The picture is outstanding straight from the box. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Horton

customer_reviews.title: Good machine
customer_reviews.text: Easy to understand and operate. No problems with it after roughly 10 hours of use.
customer_reviews.author: John Martin

customer_reviews.title: Projector for the money is fantastic, I use it each Sunday night as a ...
customer_reviews.text: Projector for the money is fantastic, I use it each Sunday night as a "Kids Theater" in the backyard and even in low light conditions it is still a nice clear picture. Once completely dark outside I would say it rivals some HD flat-screens. My only thing I would like to increase on this device is the speaker volume, but it is sold as a Projector and the fact it has a built in speaker can not deduct points for its quality, its still projects audio loud enough for a group of 15+ to hear fine in an outdoor setting.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Replacing a unit that was burned out by a lightening strike.
customer_reviews.author: GIGIX6

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Using it for powerpoint presentations at monthly meetings. Works well is decent size room.

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Portable
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is portable which was something we really needed at the office.
customer_reviews.author: godsgirlrae

customer_reviews.title: Met expectations
customer_reviews.text: Good experience so far maybe used it a dozen times over the first month with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Binz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. And the price is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Jae Chung

customer_reviews.title: Great picture. Got this instead of a TV in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great picture. Got this instead of a TV in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This projector met or exceeded my expectations! It is very easy to use, with no waiting. Just turn on the switch!
customer_reviews.author: Jmay

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly thought that this was going to be an okay product, but I was wrong. It's amazing!
customer_reviews.author: IG: New__Ink

product_meta.title: Epson VS240 SVGA 3LCD Projector 3000 Lumens Color Brightness
product_meta.description: 3000 lumens color brightness and 3000 lumens white brightness. Fast setup; HDMI connectivity.
feature_bullets: Look for two numbers: 3000 lumens Color Brightness for more accurate, vivid color3000 lumens White Brightness for well-lit rooms

SVGA resolution (800 x 600) - for projecting basic presentations and graphics. Press the E-Zoom Plus button on the remote control in order to zoom into a portion of the image and enlarging it on the screen.
Fast, easy setup, only from Epson - get up and running in no time with easy image adjustments and convenient control
Compatible with the latest laptops and media players - supports HDMI, the standard in connectivity, for digital video and audio with just one cable

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars537 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
